hasDitaContent.@value: Both gemcitabine and vinblastine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  gemcitabine  and  vinblastine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with gemcitabine. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).
